data.message:
Hey Eminem Or Marshall
Which you prefere
I know you wont right back
I understand

But i want you to read this

Im sure That you have milions mails like this

I'm not a normal fan
I'm a personne
I'm not the guy that's going to stalk you

I just want you to know that I have a difficult life
I'm sure yours was worse 
but I want to thank you to for your music that helpt through

I was born poor
All my life I was bullied
My mom and dad had me young
With my big sister
They separated young to

All my childhood was destroyed
My mom was always drinking
And putting here money in machines or coke you know
My first memorie was there ceperation and the only thing I can say is that I was 2years and I still remember like it was yesterday

My dad hanged me up on the lundry corde will he was doing a couple of lines whit his friends
He was giving me shooters laughing at me saying it was apple juice I stay there tell I pied in my pants and I finished with my sis crying in a cops car

Not only that 
There were always fighting for child support
And I was always being beaten up by my dad
We got poorer and poorer tell we couldn't even move house because we had no money
My dad was woorse then here
He almost died from a hearth attack cause from snow
He never made me feel proud of myself with all my efforts
He never did anything
Because even if my mom had nothing at lease she would of give her life for me
My dad always made me felt bad
I lived with him a little and he was never home 
I was with my grandmother
And she couldn't even buy milk for coffee but I loved her so much because she thought me a lot
She died of cancer 

I just wanted you to say I started righting rap to
Maby we will meet some day
I tell you
I started from the bottom
And thanks for the music 
Because you went through worse and it makes me stonger

Hope you right back

-Jolin

replies.message: Kill all the Muslims bomb their homes
